Articles.Content:
I have just launched a probe to Saturn. It will arrive in 12 years, so I think I could do some more things.

Probe leaving home.

A picture taken by the telescope camera.

Another photo for the probe.

 

The delta-v remained is about  2500, which is enough for the Saturn capture and further exploration.

And I am using Aerozine50 and NTO for fuel, inside the B9 Procedural Wings (Sound like a atmosphere work).
